associatedNodes_t Struct Reference
[MAC association]

#include <mac_associate.h>

Detailed Description

This is the structure for each element of the table of the associated nodes.

The node short address is the index to the array. NOTE: THE COORD SHORT ADDRESS IS ALWAYS 0.

Definition at line 41 of file mac_associate.h.


Data Fields

u8 nodeType
 Type of node, see COORD for types.
u64 nodeLongAddress
 The long (MAC) address of the node.
u16 parentShortAddress
 The short address of the parent of this node.
u16 lastRoutedAddress
 The short address of the last route from this node.
u8 wakeup:1
 If set, the child node is to be woken up.
u8 sleeping:1
 If set, the child node is a sleeping node.
